name: Slashin': Majestic Chase - Action RPG
description:
Become a hero in the fantastic world full of monsters and loot! Enjoy immersive Hack’n’Slash action RPG gameplay. Long hours of engaging gameplay guaranteed in the fully procedurally generated world, different every time you play.
Build your character from zero to hero. Join the quest to rescue the princess kidnapped by a dragon! Sounds familiar? You will be surprised by why it’s not!

Main features:

***Large, procedurally generated world***
With almost 100 unique locations that change every game, 90 monster types, 5 bosses and loads of randomly generated mini-bosses. You certainly won't be bored!

***Diversity in gameplay***
Follow the exciting storyline, try yourself in the PVP arena or dive into the infinite dungeon for old-school dungeon crawler experience.

***Rich character customisation***
Choose between 6 playable races and 3 classes. Pick from 36 powerful skills and define your unique appearance in the character editor!

***Infinite loot possibilities***
Lots of item types of various quality and magical properties gives literally endless possibilities of treasures. And that’s not all! There are also 35 mythical items with unique properties waiting for you to discover. Are you lucky enough to find them?

***Online features***
-Trade with other players in the online item shop.
-Send gift items to your friends.
-Try yourself in real-time duels on PvP arena.
-Leaderboards let you measure yourself both in single player and PvP.
